text.enText: On this path that I have chosen to run

text.jpText: ひたすらに駆け抜けて
text.enText: As I steadfastly traverse onwards

text.jpText: 頂点に立つ そう決めたの！
text.enText: At the summit, I'm determined to stand
Where I'll push my way beyond my limits
It's because I have this earnest vision
That there is not a thing I have to fear
That's not all there is

text.jpText: 本当の私 見せてあげる
text.enText: All of my sincere self, I will reveal to you
This chance comes only once in a lifetime
This "now" in which I don't want to regret

text.jpText: 有言実行 言葉にしたら
text.enText: Once I put to words the promise I want to keep
That was when my whole world started to turn
With nimble speed, and brilliance
It's with these hands, I will reach and take hold

text.jpText: 新しい幕開けを越えて
text.enText: As the curtain rises, beyond this new beginning
Willingly I proceed
With a passion that resounds through the air

text.jpText: 高鳴りというファンファーレ
text.enText: With this ringing which they call a fanfare

text.jpText: 抱きしめたら 解き放とう
text.enText: I'll embrace it close, and I'll be set free

text.jpText: 目指す場所があるから
text.enText: Because there's a place I'm destined for
On this path that I have chosen to run

text.jpText: ひたすらに駆け抜けて
text.enText: As I steadfastly traverse onwards

text.jpText: 頂点に立つ 立ってみせる！
text.enText: At the summit, I'll show you I can stand
NEXT FRONTIER Take a good look
Where I'll push my way beyond my limits
